mapper.select: SELECT A.FILE_TRGT_KEY , A.CO_CD , R.CODE_NM AS CO_CD_NM , A.PROD_CD , A.PROD_NM , A.CLNT_PJT , A.GOODS_DIV , R1.CODE_NM AS GOODS_DIV_NM , A.PRDT_CD , P.PRDT_NM , A.ITEM_DIV , R2.CODE_NM AS ITEM_DIV_NM , A.PROD_DTL_DIV20 , R3.CODE_NM AS PROD_DTL_DIV20_NM , A.PROD_DTL_DIV30 , R4.CODE_NM AS PROD_DTL_DIV30_NM , A.DSGN_DIF_CODE_ID , R5.CODE_NM AS DSGN_DIF_CODE_NM , A.PRDCTN_DIF_CODE_ID , R6.CODE_NM AS PRDCTN_DIF_CODE_NM , A.PROD_WT , A.PROD_UNIT , R7.CODE_NM AS PROD_UNIT_NM , A.PROD_SIZE , A.PROD_UPR , TO_CHAR(A.PROD_UPR_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PROD_UPR_DT , A.PROD_RMK , A.USE_YN , A.CREAT_ID , U1.NAME AS CREAT_NM , A.CREAT_PGM , TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREAT_DTTM , A.UDT_ID , U2.NAME AS UDT_NM , A.UDT_PGM , TO_CHAR(A.UDT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UDT_DTTM , A.ETC_FIELD1 , A.ETC_FIELD2 , A.ETC_FIELD3 FROM TB_BM10M01 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM01M01 AS P ON P.PRDT_CD = A.PRDT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R ON R.CODE_ID = A.CO_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R1 ON R1.CODE_ID = A.GOODS_DIV LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R2 ON R2.CODE_ID = A.ITEM_DIV LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R3 ON R3.CODE_ID = A.PROD_DTL_DIV20 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R4 ON R4.CODE_ID = A.PROD_DTL_DIV30 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R5 ON R5.CODE_ID = A.DSGN_DIF_CODE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R6 ON R6.CODE_ID = A.PRDCTN_DIF_CODE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R7 ON R7.CODE_ID = A.PROD_UNIT LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM06M01 AS U1 ON U1.ID = A.CREAT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM06M01 AS U2 ON U2.ID = A.UDT_ID WHERE A.FILE_TRGT_KEY = #{fileTrgtKey}
